about_the_game:
The game will be free to play.

How will you maintain the game's servers if it's going to be free to play?
Through the sale of cosmetics and mounts through the cash shop.

Will there be any items that give the player an advantage in the cash shop?
No, it will not have any items that give the player an advantage, it will only be sold cosmetics and some services for players.

Will the game be released on other platforms?
Initially the game will be released for PC and Android, then it will be available on other platforms.

Embark to the world on the continent of Elementis, immerse yourself in the great adventure of Elemental Land. A Brazilian indie MMORPG with a fantastic world full of monsters for you to face. The Continent of Elements is made up of several unique islands, with many different monsters and resources, only the strongest adventurers can explore the islands of Elementis.

Elemental Land has 5 unique classes, Warrior, Mage, Archer, Assassin and Priest, each of them has unique characteristics and spells, whose evolution will depend on how you distribute your attribute points.

Features



PvM - Get stronger by fighting the monsters of the world and be the strongest adventurer in Elementis.

PvP - Only the bravest adventurers risk facing another player in the dispute for better resources.

Craft - Get resources by defeating monsters and craft more powerful equipment and weapons.

Collectibles - Use specific tools to get specific resources, like a pickaxe to get ore or an ax to get wood.

Friends - Form friendships within Elemental Land and add them to your friends list.

Trading System - In the world of Elementis you can trade your items with other players at any time, but send a trade request when you get close to the player.

Groups - Play in groups of up to 5 people and share experiences, gold and loot.

Guilds - Create guilds or join one, players who are part of guilds have guild skills to help you evolve in the world of Elementis.

Guild vs Guild - Guilds will face each other in search of dominating territories and getting unique items that are only obtained through guild wars.

Quests - The world of Elementis is full of NPCs in need of your help, help them and earn rewards in return.

Pet - You can have Pets to help you explore the world of Elementis.

Mounts - Walking isn't always an advantage, so you can use mounts to help you on your journey.

Equipment Enchantment - Get magic runes to make your weapons more powerful and show your strength to everyone.

Email - Players can send emails to other players.

Storage System - Players can deposit/withdraw items and gold from the storage, other characters on the same account can also access the storage.

More functionality will be added to the game over time.
